title: You 2.0: Decide Already!
description: In the latest in our You 2.0 series, we bring you a favorite conversation with Harvard researcher Dan Gilbert. He tells us why we're bad at predicting our future happiness, how that affects our decision making, and why we are actually happier after making a decision that feels irrevocable.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
